Blake heard the gears in the machine slowly grind into place. He felt the vibrations of the little machines power course through his veins. Blake let out a small smile as he felt his bones and blood slide into place once more, harder and better then before. The electricity started to try to escape from the wires like it was alive and Blake could hear the panic in his friends voices.
"What's wrong?" Blake asked, a second later his eyes shot open. His mouth quivered slightly before letting out a scream. His pupils vanished behind a strange mist and his body began to glow.

"Turn it off!" Joanna yelled. She ran through the waving wires of the machine and kicked away the plug. They watched in disbelief,
"Impossible! It has no power!" Karina yelled, stepping away from the evil machine.

Blake screamed louder as he watched his sice explode in a beam of light. The light beams began to shater his very existence as he watched in horror.
"No! It can't end! Not like this!" Blake yelled, clenching his fist as a wave of fire fell over him.

"Blake!" Joanna and Karina yelled as they fell across the room from the explosion. Joanna slowly opened her tear filled eyes. Her heart rate slowed, time seemed to stop.
"Blake!" she yelled, but her voice seemed muffled to her. A tear fell down her cheek as the sprinklers came on. Hr brain smashed its self onto her skull, trying to get out.
"Please.. no" She muttered, stumbling towards the destroyed machine.

Blake looked at the ocean, a smile on his face. He gently kicked a wave as Lith sat next to him.
"Blake... Joanna still needs you..." lith spoke in unearthly tones. Her clothes were made out of leafs and her hair was naturally green. She smiled, none of the sand around her seemed to want to cling to her bare feet like they did to Blake.
"I know.." Blake said, watching the water rise and fall,
"Lith... is this death?" Blake asked, looking towards the girl. He felt like he knew her all his life. She smiled, "No, death is much darker then here. This is limbo, where your fate is decided."

Silence moved the clock forward.

"Lith..." Blake questioned, before Lith read his mind with a smile,
"Why is limbo a island with a forest and trees, without any others? There are places for different people, evil people who has done murder would be in a house filled with people who have the same guilt in their hearts. Good people that are pure of heart go to a clouded place with a golden gate." Lith smiled,
"Yet we are alone, because we are different Blake. You will find it out later." Blake looked at the girl, questions bubbled in his eyes.
"Wait! Lith! Why am I different? Lith!" Blake yelled, getting up. He fell to the ground. He looked at his foot, then at the shifting sand. His eyes shifted towards Lith.
"Bye Blake." Lith said with a smile. She watched Blake get dragged under the ocean of sand. A smile spread onto her gentile lips as she turned and walked into the Jungle before her.

"Joana!" Blake yelled, opening his eyes. He groaned slightly as he saw Joana slowly wobble towards him. "Oh crap..." Blake muttered as she stumbled forward.

A big guy appeared blocking way to Blake and Joana, Blake inmediately went in front of her and was in guard, ready for the worst, and the big one laughed and said -"So...you're the one nobody beats, huh? and the one who protects this girl though she isn't even his girlfriend?"- -"That's not of your business, and I protect her because she's my friend and nobody must be injured by my own fights"- Blake answered, with some anger since this one was the worst school bully...Ivan (yes the same that years after Blake would kick easily) -"So, do you want to play, Blake?"- -"I don't fight for idiots' pleassure"- -"Well then, I'll have to obligate you!!"- and with this he tried to punch Joana, she covered herself in fear but didn't feel anything and saw that Blake intercepted the blow receiving himself -"Blake!"- was the only thing she could scream and he, calmly said -"Don't worry, I know you don't like me to fight but I won't let this guy hurt you in any way!"- Blake said and started his life's fight. Joana remained silent but she almost cried b inside with those words, thinking 'You always say that and go fighting...but...will it ever end?'.

Blake started, this was one of his hardest fights, he was a good fighter but was on extremely physical disadvantage (he was just a 13 years old against a mastodon) he easily connected fists and kicks but nothing seemed to hurt Ivan too much, as he laughed -"You bug, you can't even hit me, you only tickle me!"- Blake thought to himself 'Dammit...I won't be able to keep fighting with this guy for too long'. After several minutes Blake was pretty tired and Ivan wasn't hurt at all. Then, he said -"Now it's my turn!"- As he blowed a weakened Blake with the hardest punch, sending him a meter away, and he couldn't even get up since Ivan started to hit him brutally, leaving him worst than ever, but even with that, many years of fighting made Blake stronger than average boys, and he could resist for a while, being able to stand up (very, very injured) and trying to keep the fight, being thrown to ground by Ivan, hitting his face against the floor and stomped by Ivan's feet...Joana was horrorized at seeing this and couldn't resist, she started to cry...

Blake was being blown when for a moment he could see Joana's crying...and thought 'This is all my fault...she doesn't deserve to suffer for a guy like me!' And connected some hits but Ivan wasn't hurt, then Ivan threw him against lockers, hurting him a lot but the pain of the wounds wasn't stronger than knowing that he was making Joana suffer, even when he didn't know that they both loved mutually...

Joana stepped in to stop the fight and said angerly -"Stop it, Ivan!"- And his answer was -"Shut up, cheap bicth!"- and he smacked her against the wall, that was his last move. Blake saw almost in slow motion what happened and, he felt like something inside him crashed into thousands of small pieces, and became furious, furious as he never had been before, and with his last energy, he stood up again and said furiously: -"IVAN!!! THAT...WAS...YOUR...LAST...MOVE!!!"- And not knowing how he ran toward him and hit with his strongest punch in face, making Ivan to fall down, knocked out. 134111112.content:
Blake stood up and smiled, he arched one hand behind his back and stretched.
"Good as new!" he hesitated and kissed Joana on the cheek. A gust of wind howled down the hallway, the double doors swung open and a hunched silhouette stood there, bleeding. The boy limped in and fell onto the floor. Every eye turned to look at the figure on the floor. The boys hair was dried in his blood and each breath was strained and full of pain, his lips were dry and cracked. Blake's smile faded, his arms became limp. He trudged down the hallway and fell to his knees,

"Ayrton..." Blake muttered. A note was on Ayrton's back. Blake scanned over it. His eyes hardened, his lips squeezed tight. Anger flowed through his body. It was a threat. The letter had wrote,
'This was nothing! You can't protect every one. Meet us in the park at 6:00pm, better not be late! Or else' Blake stood up and smiled weakly,
"Sorry Joana, I'm going to break our promise..." she looked up at him,
"You're... going to fight them, aren't you?" she looked down at the ground and fell silent.

6:00 pm crawled towards them slowly. It was a unwanted omen. A black crow cawed. 6:00 had arrived.
134111112.title: Blake's last fight.

1341111121.content:
Knives were drawn, knuckles clenched and in the bushes, a gun clicked. Someone walked over the hill with a smile, etched, onto his face.
"Who are you?" The leader of the gang shouted. The boy stopped, still smiling. His eyes, covered, by white hair that was almost touching his shoulders. He licked his lips, slow and purposefully,
"Name's Blaze..." The guys smiled,
"Fan club of Blake? Your name is almost the same, and it sounds like some cheesy superhero!" They teased Blaze and his grin grew,
"Blake's mine, do you think you can beat him? Yes... of course you can... Blakes not at his full strength. He has potential... but to let that potential loose you can't kill him. That will be my job... when he is ready." Blaze laughed at the gang, "Show me what you got!" The gang tensed.

Blaze jumped forwards, his smile stayed. He spun away from the on-coming knife, "Too slow!" He yelled, his grin growing bigger as he grabbed the gang members arm and snapped it. The man screamed, letting go of the knife and cradled his arm. Blaze jumped to a impossible height, taking the leader with him,
"Wait! We won't go after Blake! Please!" He screamed as Blaze laughed,
"But I'm having so much fun!" He kicked the man in the face, then continued to punch him in the stomach. All the gang could do was watch in horrror as Blaze did a huge combination of acrobatic kicks and spins on their boss in mid air. Once Blaze was satisfied, he smashed the man's head into the ground, Knocking him out. Blaze jumped backwards and disappeared into the bushes. Seconds later they heard a scream, then a unconscious member of the gang emerged, "Don't play with guns" Blaze called through from the bush. The gang looked at each other, then started to run.

Blake woke up in a cuboard.
" Ouch... what hit me? Oh no! The fight!"

When Blake reached the park, he saw the twitching bodies of the gang members. There was blood everywhere, even Blake had to look away,
"Looks like some tried to escape..." Blaze muttered as he saw the unconscious bodies of the gang in the distance,
"Better start training Blake if you hope to beat me..." Blake looked at the speaker, white hair covered his eyes.
"What creature did this? Not even a bear could of done this!" Blake yelled. The white haired boy smiled,
"I appreciate the compliment" Blake stepped backwards, something he had never done in fear. His whole body started to shake with rage,
"You.. Bastard!" Blake ran towards him, Blaze tutted.
"You have been in a way too soft environment... not that much danger at all." Blaze stopped running.Something forced him to stop. "Life is cruel Blake. But even that has it's rewards." He drew aut a weird gun and fired it. "Survive the week and you will be ready... Don't worry about death, just wory about the pain... You can't die like this, but you will want to." Blake fell to his knee's and passed out.

When he woke up he found himself to be tiny and in...

Some years ago, when Blake was 9 and she 10, after some months they befriended, 5th grade bullies threatened them one day, and despite the fighting duo was almost unbeatable, they were being beaten by a bunch of 5th grade bullies, Karina and Blake were pretty injured and Blake fainted for a moment, Karina was about to, she just resisted more somewhat (Is supposed that men are stronger while women have more resistance, according with genetics).

And when she fell down, and one of the bullies put her foot on her head, Blake got up, but he was strange, his hair spiked slightly (not very noticeable) and his eyes became fully white, he didn't say anything, just defeated all that bunch of bullies in question of seconds, mostly punching them or kicking in stomach and neck. Then, Blake looked at her for some seconds and fell down again, fainting, he muttered with a faint voice -"...i won't...let you..."- and went unconscious.

Karina at first was scared about that kind of fury state but then she understood that Blake hardly ever reached those fury levels and that he was still somewhat himself, he didn't hurt people who mattered for him, only the ones who hurt him or her...Karina was the only who understood almost perfectly Blake's fury state until she explained to Joana when Blake went furious again in the fight with Ivan. And now...he lost a fight with that, supposed to be unbeatable in that form...would Blaze be really that strong that Blake couldn't defeat him even at furious state?
134111112222211.title: Karina appears...

After regaining her memories, she answered to Blake

-"Don't underestimate a girl...A lesson this guy must learn is: Never make a girl angry, or worse...never make a fighting girl angry..."- With those words, she dashed toward Blaze beginning the combat connecting fists and kicks, Blaze found difficult to dodge her attacks, both because he was already damaged and because Karina was faster, still strong, with enough skills to beat most school bullies alone. Karina connected many consecutive kicks (her speciality, and the first kind of move she used when fought Blake at first time), Blaze grabbed her leg and said

-"You lose"- coldly, And threw Karina down, but she made a circular kick which made Blaze trip and fall. She then answered

-"I told you...Never make angry a girl"- Blaze knew that girls may be dangerous when hopped wild, but he was way stronger to be afraid of. He got up and blocked Karina's fists and said

-"I was just playing"- punching her many times on stomach and kicking her, throwing her on Blake, who was still on the floor, not having enough strenght to get up.

Karina said after falling on Blake

-"Uh...Sorry..."- She got up and Blaze hit her again many times, leaving her almost injured as Blake was. Blaze came close to them and said

-"How cute, and stupid, heh"- He lifted up Karina an began to hit her, when a fist hit his face, making him release her, it was Blake, pretty tired, still furious.

Blaze said -"This is gonna be fun"-

Blake, Karina, and Blaze, stood up in guard position for a moment, before starting to fight again, and after almost beating Blaze, he said

-"You need to unleash your true strenght and your wildness...You'll get into a more dangerous environment, don't worry about dying, you won't, but maybe after some moments you'll wish to"-

Saying that, he hit Karina, leaving her unconscious, and then, he deployed a weird gun, Blake just answered

-"You coward!!"- thinking that he was going to die, Blaze just shot at him and shrank him (Blake remained unconscious, so, he didn't know about his size change yet). Blaze left saying

-"You maybe are a worthy warrior, I hope to not be wrong, I'll fight you next time, soon...Survive for some time, when you were ready, I'll know..."-
1341111122222111.title: Karina vs Blaze...

13411111222221111.content:
Karina woke up, wondering about that weird guy and Blake...She opened her eyes and looked, there wasn't the guy, Karina smiled slightly

'Blake, you did it again' thought, and then that thought slapped her mind

'BLAKE!' and looking around, Blake wasn't in there also, and despite Blake isn't very emotive, even with Joana, he'd never leave her alone and unconscious like that.

-"Something must have happened"- she muttered, and before getting up, stared at something which seemed to be like a bug, she looked for some seconds and thought it was just a little doll like Polly Pocket or something like that. She decided to forget about it when she heard a faint voice, the doll was moving!!

-"puff...ugghh..."- Blake got up with difficult, not knowing the big, or better said, little problem he had. Karina stared at him and looked that the "doll" was kind of hurt and his clother were damaged, just like...Blake? While she wondered about it, Blake muttered to himself after looking around (Karina was behind him and hadn't looked at her),

-"Ok...that was weird...that dammit Blaze shot at me cowardly, but...- He looked at his hands and arms, he was still hurt but not more than he was before falling unconscious,

-"...And...Shouldn't I be dead?...Or...no...this can't be heaven...or hell, right?"- Blake muttered while seeing the strange world he was now. Which he didn't know is that his words were his saviors, because Karina recognized his voice, and when she did, she picked him up quickly (maybe a bit roughly) and hugged him tightly

-"Blake, I'm so happy to see that you are alive!!"- Blake was surprised by this, he was quickly lifted up and squashed against a soft and warm thing, then he heard Karina's voice and after fractions of seconds he realized the terrible truth...he was shrunk, S-H-R-U-N-K, tiny, weak, puny, defenseless, and practically a bug with clothes...Those thoughts were on his mind, he was in a situation where he would have all disadvantages...he was sad and angry because Blaze did that to him...

Since he was being squashed, he answered to Karina

-"..well...I won't be so much longer at this rate..."- Karina released him inmediately and said

-"Sorry...I...I just thought you disappeared or were dead..."- and blushed slightly, she always worried about him and even protected him in some fights where Blake was weakened by fighting many thugs and they were still more. She had a protective behavior to him, but it had its own style (Joana is technically a lot more protective but she rarely fights).

Then, she asked

-"And...I didn't see...why are you so small and where's that weirdo?"- She placed him on her palm to let him to talk, he explained

-"First, that weirdo's name is Blaze, I know it sounds like a kind of cheesy hero or something like that but he has an overwhelming fighting level, well you know that, and...after leaving you unconscious, he shot at me with a strange gun, it looked like a futuristic thing or a toy, and then, he said I had to survive in a more dangerous environment...and then, I'm here, squashed by my friend and telling my story"-

They both laughed, Karina was a little surprised Blake wasn't so sad or angry as she thought, despite being a fierce fighter, he han an impressive self control, which he only lost in a very few times (becoming extremely furious). He seemed to be calm, maybe because now he was safe and that he had hopes to find a way to get him back to normal.

Karina got up after some minutes with Blake on her palm and thought 'What should I do with him now?'
13411111222221111.title: Karina wakes up and sees a tiny Blake beside her..

Karina said

-"Well, we better get outta here"- Then, before beginning to walk, she thought about Blake's current state, he was shrunk and wounded, and, despite she would be able to heal him, it would be better that Joana did that, since she is Blake's girlfriend, that had to be the most appropiate. Karina asked to Blake

-"Blake, I don't ask you if you are ok beacuse you always say you are...but we both know you're hurt and at that size..."- Blake looked at her with a 'What do you mean?' expression, she continued, saying

-"Would you want me to take you with Joana?"- Blake nodded, but then he said

-"No, wait! What ARE YOU DOING?...Joana can't see me like this,if she worries for me by a normal fight...she may dismay seeing me like this..."- Karina answered

-"Hmm, maybe you're right, but she still loves you and will take care of you, anyways, she'd heal you whatever size you were"-

Blake was convinced but not fully, the part of him which didn't want to see Joana in grief was blaming him for his new condition...for some reason, he couldn't see Joana suffering, in fights, he even lost control and became furious, beating many strong guys a few times, he couldn't stand with crossed arms seeing Joana sad...maybe he felt love earlier he thought, but his lifestyle had repressed his love related emotions, he barely felt anything else than anger and sadness, but not in such degree as he showed shen someone hurt Joana.

But after secondary's days he could understand more about her, about love, and about himself. And he said to Karina

-"Yeah, you're right, after all, Joana is the most caring and affectionate person I know..."- Then, realizing of what he said, he apologized with Karina

-"I don't mean you are not caring, I'm just...agh, I'm just a jerk"- Karina laughed and said

-"I got what you were saying, I'm not mad to that. Joana is really caring to you."- She began to walk, with some difficult, since she was hurt from Blaze's fight also. Blake was a lot more hurt but he was able to stand up even at his current wounded state. His fighting life made him truly stronger than normal.

She began to walk toward Joana's house, and after many painful steps, being very injured, she reached it with her last energies. It took to her about half of an hour, but finally she arrived. After all, she wasn't that damaged as Blake was, at least...

She knocked the door, and after some seconds, Joana opened the door.

-"Hi Karina..."- She saw Karina and asked with some fear

-"What happened to you?"-

-"Ugh...I'm okay, Joana...but..."- Karia tried to calm her down

-"What's going on, and why are you so injured?"- Joana asked

-"Well...I helped Blake fighting a weird guy named 'Blaze', he was extremely strong, maybe stronger than a bear, he could even beat Blake at his furious state"-

-"What?!"- Joana was now in panic

-"And if you're THAT damaged...WHERE'S Blake??!!"- Yes, Joana was in super panic now, and Karina didn't find a way to tell her the 'little' problem Blake had

-"Well...I don't know how to tell this..."-

-"Blake's dead??!!"- Joana interrupted, being really worried about him, and Karina continued

-"He's safe..."- Joana rushed out and said

-"What are you waiting for? Blake need us and we can't let him like that"-

Karina knew Joana had that kind of behavior when it was something about Blake, she was really motherly in some times...and very protective, and decided to tell her about Blake being calm

-"Joana, we don't need to go for him"-

-"WHAT?! You crazy!!? Or...did you take him to hospital?"- Joana calmed slightly

-"No, if I did that, they wouldn't let me go out and you'd be a lot more panicked than now because you wouldn't know anything"- Joana answered

-"So, where's Blake"- Karina was a little nervous about telling her because Joana may react as an angry lioness to her...she gulped and said -"Weell...Take this little gift I brought for you and I'll explain you everything"- Joana was getting angry, and even Karina, who was her friend and a very brave one, was afraid, Blake was right in a thing: ANGRY JOANA = YOU BETTER RUN OR DIE!!, fortunely for him this never applied to himself. She remembered why people was afraid to provoke Joana...

In 8th grade, almost in last months, after Ivan incident, Blake and Joana were normal, he recovered fully from that fight and was the same everyone knew (he didn't remember what Joana said to him while he was unconscious lying on the nursery bed).

Joana was a little saddened because she wasted her chance to asking him out, and despite he noticed something, Joana said it was nothing and since he almost never understood girls, he stopped thinking about that matter.

One day, Ivan appeared again to claim revenge, and, rushing in, he said angerly

-"Blake!! Fight me like a man!! Second round!!"-

Blake stood in guard but before doing anything he saw Joana and felt the sadness in her eyes...he decided that this was time to change things, he stood normal and said

-"Why have I to fight you again? I won and you're just scum, so, leave and let us in peace"-

Ivan laughed and answered

-"You coward!! Are you afraid about round 2? Hah! I knew you were just a crybaby!!"-

Blake closed his fists and said

-"Well, since I'm one, you're less than that because I'm stronger"- He looked at Joana again, he felt like something in her was chaining him, and Ivan said

-"Well here I come, you ready or not"-

And hit with a fist which Blake dodged and locked him from behind, twisting his other arm and his back, making him bend backward, which may even break his spine with more strenght and said coldly

-"I don't need to fight to beat you"- Joana smiled, not because of the combat, but because Blake wasn't fighting for her...Maybe there was hope for her, Blake wasn't insensitive, and was trying to not hurt her feelings.

But Ivan regained strenght and grabbed Blake with his free hand and threw him forward, hitting him against a wall and then Ivan hit him in the body. Blake was about begin to fight but the thought about Joana's worries for him made him not fight at all, and, trying to dodge a hit, the fist hit him on the back of his neck and fell down, almost fainting, since the back of his neck resulted to be his weakpoint, but nobody knew it.

Ivan just laughed and said

-"You're weaker than I thought"- And got closer to him, Blake just said with a fainting voice

-"Joana...I'm sorry"- and got unconscious

(NOTE: Blake wasn't weaker, in fact, he was stronger than before but he wasn't able to fight because of Joana and that he was blown down on his weakpoint)

Ivan was about to finish him off when Joana ran there and stood in front of Blake, between him and Ivan and said

-"Stop it! I won't let you to hurt him anymore"- Ivan laughed by the idea of Joana protecting Blake, he thought she was a weak girl and, like last time, he tried to slap her off, but Joana wouldn't let him this time, and stopped the hit with one hand (ONE HAND!!).

Ivan realized something was wrong and said

-"What the hell?! Why..."-

Those were his last words, Joana only punched him in stomach with such a strenght that would have made Blake become frightened to her, and she said angerly

-"Never, never hurt my Blake again!!!"-

Ivan was in so much pain and bent down, he fell on his knees and then he fell down completely, he almost popped his eyes with that fist hit and said with the few air he had left

-"u...ugh...how...how could this be...ughhhh..."- he blacked out.

Everyone took a step back when Joana looked at them, now the knew that seriously nobody should get Joana mad...(and the weird fact is that Karina is the fighting one, but Joana, due to his maternal instincts, uses the true strenght of a girl).

She knelt down and hugged Blake, then, he woke up after some minutes (even being hit in his weakpoint, he was able to wake up quickly since this time he was practically intact. He saw Ivan thrown in the floor but he thought he lost control again, but unlike other times, Joana wasn't sad, and he felt a kind of inner power coming from her. For obvious reasons, nobody told Blake Joana blew out Ivan with one fist. And didn't even Karina (not wanting to be next) nor Joana (not wanting Blake afraid of her because she would never do that to him).

Karina said in a scared tone

-"Please, you first must take this and you'll understand"- she saw the anger from Joana's eyes and quickly took out from her purse something which seemed to be a mini doll (2 cm). Karina put it on Joana's extended palm. She looked at it (Blake was in deep sleeping because of the fight)

-"This doll resembles to Blake, but what's with this? How does this tell me where's my boy?"- Karina calmed her down and said

-"It's hard to believe but the weird Blaze shot at him with a toy-like gun, and he shrank down to his current size..I mean...you have Blake on your hand..."-

Joana was surprised by this and looked more carefully at her boyfriend, she was able to see his ripped shirt and his wounds (tiny to her). Suddenly, something in her happened, she felt more protective now that Blake was shrunk, and, more loving also. She began to caress him softly on his head and chest with her fingers, very softly. Karina said, opening the door

-"Well...I have to go...Take good care of him, please"- And she left, maybe she was going to a nursery, or maybe she went with Ayrton. Anyways, now Blake was safe with her and that was the only thing what mattered for her..

[NOTE: What it was said in here doesn't mean Joana was an angry person or that she had anger problems, she hardly ever became in anger and just for Blake being in danger, just like a protective mother, unlike Blake's...]

13411111222221111111.content:
Blake began to wake up, he just recovered enough energy to stand up normally, the last he remembred was Karina putting him into her purse and then he fell asleep since he was too tired and injured, now, he was staring at his gigantic girlfriend, who smiled to him. Blake, thinking she was about to scold him for fighting (which she never has done but Blake always thinks that she will)

He just scratched the back of his neck and smiled nervously, thinking up a way to explain Joana his new size and the rest of the story, but, fortunely or unfortunely for him, she knew that gesture already, and said softly -"Blake, my love. Don't worry. I know this isn't your fault"- She brought him closer to her face and kissed him. Then, she said -"Anyways, I never get angry at you, hehe"- Joana said happily, closing her eyes. She looked very cute in that moment to Blake, and he said -"It's okay..."- Joana knew that when Blake answered vaguely it meant he really was in trouble, or at least he felt so. She wanted to comfort him because he's the only person she cares. -"Blake..."- She began to speak -"Huh?"- Blake seemed to be thinking, maybe about how would he live at that tiny size, or even how he may die...all that looked to be more than what he could bear. But he always went forward when he had trouble, he was stronger than this, Joana's voice interrupted his thoughts. -"I...I don't want you to be sad...I'm here to take care of you"- She hugged Blake and said -"I'll always be here to protect you. I won't to let anything happen to you. Believe me"- It worked, Blake was comforted, but the 'Believe me' made him think that she was hiding something from him or just emphasized her phrase. Then, the memories about Ivan's second fight came to him, and he remembered that he got unconscious and when woke up Ivan was already defeated and Joana was hugging him, which resulted to be strange if he had lost control...Joana almost always became sad until she realized he lost control only when someone hurt her (In other circunstances it would be more rarely he did), and that she was the only one able to calm his furious mode...

Why? Well...Going back in time again...In 9th grade, when Blake almost stopped fighting because of Joana, and their feelings to each other were becoming more obvious, Blake fought a bully who wanted to defeat him and Blake accepted the challenge when he saw Ayrton was blown down by him. He was another overwhelming one, and the combat was almost equal because Blake was older, more skilled, and stronger than when he fought Ivan. But Joana appeared and tried to stop the fight, Blake was distracted by this and this guy blew him and hit brutally, sending him against a wall... Then, he threw Joana down to the floor when she tried to save Blake, and...He lost control. Blake became furious and began to kick that jerk's ass, defeating him easily, but, in difference to other times, he wasn't stopping, he was still punching and hitting him even after he gave up, and really was damaging him. Blake made him to spit blood when he kicked him in stomach, then he punched many times in face and wasn't done, he grabbed him on the neck and lifted him up, then hurled him several times against the wall (Blake doesn't speak in that state, so, he didn't say anything). After all that, he wasn't still done, Karina and Joana became afraid of Blake killed him and, remembering, there was no way to stop him. At least it seemed so. Blake at furious state didn't stop with nothing, that was that everyone believed since years ago. But Joana decided to do something, she walked a few steps toward him and said -"Blake, stop it!"- Everyone thought it was useless, but Blake stopped hurling the guy and then, seeing it was successful, Joana said -"Please, let him go, he already learned that he must no bully anyone"- Blake became confused, and for the first time, he released him. Joana walked toward him and said -"Come here Blake, forget about that fool one"- Blake now was very confused, even when his fury state almost always blocked everything else in his mind but he wasn't able to ignore Joana. And felt great pain in his head and body...he grabbed his head with both hands while bent with pain, the conflict inside him was incredible... Joana stared at him for a moment, then, the bully wanted to get his chance and hit Blake when he was vulnerable... he fell down and quickly got up, being more angry, but before he did anything else, Joana put her arms around him and kissed him...Everyone gasped since they never had done such thing and even weren't a couple yet. The most amazing thing was that Blake's fury state stopped, his hair went normal and the iris in his eyes returned, after some seconds, Joana looked at Blake and he only reached to say -"J-Joana...I..."- and fell down, losing consciousness. Never anyone thought that Joana would be able to calm Blake's fury such way. Blake didn't remember anything from this (He never has memories about what happens when he loses control)

Blake thought more deeply, and remembered why she wasn't sad as usually was when he lost control that day...he decided to ask it to her -"Joana?"- -"What is it, sweetie?"- she answered -"Do you remember the day Ivan fought me and I refused to?"- -"How could I forget it! I....!!"- She cut herself off before saying something else, Blake tipped off that something was hidden to him -"I remember losing consciousness and then, when I woke up, Ivan was defeated, but you weren't sad as you always are when I lost control of myself..."- Joana hesitated and, realizing Blake wanted the truth, she said -"I'll tell you but promise me you won't be afraid of me"- -"Why would I?"- asked Blake, disconcerted, and Joana answered -"I...I wasn't going to let Ivan hurt you and I defeated him with a punch"- -"You WHAT??!!"- that wasn't the kind of answer he would expect from her. Karina was supposed to be the fighting one, and she wasn't that strong. Joana said -"I didn't tell you because I didn't want you to be frightened about me"- She hugged him and said -"I only did that because I love you"- Then, Blake felt better, knowing that Joana was protective even when he wasn't shrunk.

Then, she said -"Now, let me heal you"- She licked him several times, which was weird to Blake -"Ermm...that was weird Joana...Why did you...??"- Blake began to ask when Joana answered -"I don't have bandages that small for you and I thought this would be the best way to heal you, and, I enjoyed doing it"- she said jokingly, and then laughed.

Blaked spun around and walked off, smacking himself on the forehead while Joana looked out of the window with a confused look on her face. Blake clenched his fists and tightly closed his eyes.
"Hey lovely.." Blake gazed back at a huge group of boys, there were about 13 of them. Blake was a good fighter... but not that good. He began to walk away,

Jef was having the time of his life untill he got hit by a truck. He flew down the hallway and skidded on his back. When his eyes focused he saw Blake lowering his nee.
"Is he stupid or what?" Shouted Jef's friend. Blake planted his heel on the boys chest and twisted. His other foot lifted off the ground and kicked the boy in the face. More fists connected, Blake fell to his nee's and got beaten and kicked into the ground. They left him soaking in his own blood. They both laughed and the bell rang. Joana waved goodbye and walked to lesson's
"That day was the best day of my life" Blake grinned happily.

You won't defeat him, he's too strong"- Ayrton exclaimed, Blake remained silent and then said with a more serious tone -"I won't know it until I fight him"- -"If you are going to fight him, I'll do so"- Ayrton said, remebering an atrocious past battle, when a bully called Ivan, who was like this guy (less heavier and stronger and they were 13 years old in that time), Blake could barely beat him and only because he became extremely furious when that damned guy dared to hurt Joana and that was his last move...Ayrton knew as well as Joana that despite Blake fought his whole life, his body has its limits (he could resist for longer a fight that Ivan would have finished in less than 5 minutes) and he wouldn't let him suicide like that, then Ferdinand added -"I'll fight also"- Blake was annoyed by this by two facts, his friends were hurt and, he never liked to fight with numerical advantage, it was kinda coward, and he didn't say anything as he started the fight alone...

Blake stood in guard in front of this guy and said -"Who are you and what the hell do you want?!"- The big guy laughed and answered -"My name is Albert, and you must know my little brother...Ivan"- Blake froze for a moment '...It can't be...Ivan had a big brother...dammit' he thought and then said -"I guess you want to avenge him, do't you?"- -"Nah...Ivan is just a weakling"- Blake couldn't believe that arrogance, it had t be just a joke, nobody could call Ivan a weakling, then, he finally said -"So, let's end this once for all"- And they two started the combat, Blake dodged his fists and connected a good punch in his jaws, but he wasn't even stunned, Blake thought for a moment that when he fought Ivan it was like this, he didn't seem to be hurt even after several strong hits...

The fight continued, the fists of they both were flying at a very high speed, crashing in some times and Blake's connecting in others, even at this moment, Albert had failed every punch, Blake kicked him and made some combos but Albert stood up in perfect conditions, like nothing happened to him, and several minutes elapsed like this, Blake was dodging every punch and connecting nice hits which resulted useless, he kept fighting like this for more than 20 minutes, after this, Blake was getting tired, at this rate, he wouldn't be able to keep fighting for long, his energies were running low and Albert was still alright, maybe a bit hurt but it was almost unnoticeable. She noticed a small thing on the floor. It seemed to be a doll, but when she picked it up and looked closer, she realized that it resembled Blake a lot... and that is was severely damaged... Joana kept looking the wounds, she thought 'A wounded Blake's doll? Who would make this?' She put her finger on its chest and found a very little stain of blood.

-"This is strange... dolls don't bleed..."- In other times she'd have just discarded the doll but since she was really worried about Blake, her instincts told her to examine the supposed doll. Joana checked if wasn't it just paint, but she look how the miniature Blake was still bleeding. She gasped, and brought him near her eyes, she noticed the weak movement of breathing. Joana decided to ask Karina about this, she was practically a genius and was Blake's best friend besides Ayrton and Ferdinand. So, she placed him in her cleavage because she thought that her pocket might be too rough for him in his current state. She grabbed her stuff and met up with Karina in the classroom. They were lucky that besider her and Blake, not much people in this school liked biology so nobody bothered on arriving early.

Joana entered and found Karina, who was doing some homework with her laptop. She greeted her. Joana greeted her back and sat in at a desk next to hers. Karina was surprised to see her alone, and was worried

-"Did you find Blake?... Or... was he that badly beaten...?"- She said the last with slight fear. When they were 10, Blake alone didn't stand a chance against Albert. He and Karina together were barely able to beat him and both got terribly hurt

-"Sort of... But I need your help..."- Joana answered and Karina immediately sat up, now worried

-"Is he somewhere unconscious and you couldn't get help?!!"-

-"Nope, well... he's unconscious... but I managed to bring him with me..."- Joana said, Karina raised an eyebrow, Joana was alone... so... why did she say Blake was with her?

-"Uhmm... where did you bring him?"-

-"It's difficult to explain... please, don't tell me I'm crazy..."- Joana said

-"What is it? Say it already!!"-

Meanwhile, Blake slowly woke up, he was very damaged and all of his senses weren't working as they should. He found himself in an unknown place. It was dark, with very weak illumination. He could see that the place he was in was seemingly peach colored, he had little strength to move but felt around, he thought that he might be somewhere outside school, but the walls around him felt soft... and warm... That snapped Blake out of his weakness for a moment, he thought that definitively there are no such things as warm and soft concrete, or rocks...

He heard a heartbeat behind him. It sounded like a heartbeat, but was far stronger. He noticed that his own body was still battered and bleeding, and all of this, him waking up, this strange, there was only one thing Blake could figure out.....Death...

'So... this is the afterlife? How strange... no clouds, no grass, no ground... just this strange place... I guess that the heartbeat is a reminder of life's constant flow or something like that... whoever who made this place had a bizarre yet poetic of what death is like...' He thought, remembering one of his Biology classes

-"The first sound every person hears is the heartbeat"- Said his teacher in a class. He also said something about motherly stuff that Blake didn't bother to listen. He had had many bad experiences with what everyone else calls a mother. Why? To make the story short: His mother never wanted him, and hated him every day of his life, until 5 years old when he and his father were forced to leave the house. He was never nursed nor had ANY experience with a mother.

Until 4 years later when he was 9, he was found by his grandmother, Irma (Blake's father died the day they were forced out, defending Blake from his brother who was seeking revenge on him). She was the only woman he ever called Mama. She soon noticed Blake's disgust toward mothers and most of related stuff in general... at the time, Karina herself didn't help either, as she had mistaken him for a bully, and seeked every chance to fight him, Blake described her as 'The girl who wants to punch me for no reason'.

His grandmother however told him that he was deeply hurt by his past, but that he should let a woman to help him in the future, to fix those wounds. Blake at 10 years of course denied needing care from someone else (Specifically, he stated that he didn't need other than his only family left, his grandma). By that time, Karina had become his friend and fought at his side. Meeting Claire filled Blake with doubts, as her behavior was strange for him... To Blake's logic, Karina's behavior was the normal one... not that she looked tomboyish but she was a girl who kicked asses.

Claire's constantly hugging Blake annoyed him further. That's why, years later, when he was 12, he was reluctant to let Joana, a girl he just saved the first day of 7th grade from a bully, heal the wound he got from a knife the bully used. Let alone that Joana effectively grew fond of him, despite he just wanted to get away from her. Still, he protected her from many other guys who threatened her. Joana was in love with him in no time and he had no idea. For three years, Blake just thought of her as a second Claire, though for some reason he didn't fell that annoyed. He also found surprising that he felt he could tell her his past and why he is the way he is.

141111.content:
As Joana and Karina laughed, the teacher and the rest of the students entered the class.

“Well, what’s so funny you two?”
“Oh, nothing” the two girls said.

With that, the class started and the girls sat at their seats, worrying for little Blake. After what felt like forever, the class ended and Joana and Karina headed into the women’s room. Joana took Blake out and gave him to Karina.

“How does he look. I’m just so worried about him.”
“Well, his wounds seem to have stopped bleeding and he’s a little bit more active. He should wake up soon.”
“Oh, thank the lord. I’ve just been so worried for him. He just so small...so vulnerable.”
“You’ve got that right. Let’s just hope he even remembers who he is.”

Joana could only worry even more about him. What if he didn’t remember who he was? What if he didn’t remember who she was?

Minutes passed. Joana lightly nestled Blake in her hands, running her finger along his small head. She could feel him in there. Suddenly, his head moved away from her finger, just ever so slightly. She jerked her hand slightly at his movement. She brought him closer to her face, wanting to see her dear Blake.

“Blake. Blake. Can you hear me?” Blake slowly moved around.
“Ugh. Joana, is that you?”
“Yes Blake, it’s me. Thank the lord you’re alive.”
“Yes...Ugh, why is this floor so squishy and warm?”
“Um...Blake. Open your eyes.” Joana watched as Blake opened his eyes. At the sight of his now giant girlfriend, he fell back in complete shock.
“What in the!? Joana, how do you get so big!?”
“Technically speaking, she isn’t the one who changed Blake” Karina butted in.
“Wait, if you guys are...then I...SHRUNK?!?” He screamed in terror.
“Yeah...Look, we don’t know what happened. I found you in the hall at your small size. I’m just glad I saw you and didn’t...you know.”
“Yeah. So, what do we do now? I can’t stay small forever.”
“Well, I could try to figure out what caused you to turn small and make some kind of reversal serum, but I can’t make any promises.”
“Wait, really? Will it hurt?”
“Honestly, I have no clue. Since you had passed out before shrinking, you should pass out when it happens, but it’s not a certain.”
“Well, as long as I get back to normal, then I don’t care. So, when do you think you’ll have it done.”
“Again, no idea. These things take time. Um...I don’t know how to ask you this but I need some of your blood.”
“My Blood!?”
“Yes. Whatever caused your shrinking would be in your DNA, or at least traces of it.”
“Ok...”
“Oh wait. Joana, your hand.” Joana looked down at her hand, now red from Blake’s blood.
“Oh, well I guess you already have it.”
“Indeed. Now, I’ll have to get to the lab and start working on the formula. Joana, keep him safe.”
“Keep me safe? I can take care of myself, you know.”
“Blake, at your size, you can easily get hurt. Just let me take care of you.”
“Fine, but only because you’re my girlfriend.”
“Good, now I need to go to the rest of my classes. I guess you can ride in my backpack. Sound good?”
“Yeah.”

With that, Joana hid a Blake and headed Tom class.

Joana looked down at her little friend, relieved to finally see him relaxed. As Blake closed his eyes to rest, Joana layed on her bed, dozing off as well.

It was late in the night when Joana woke up again. As she sat up, she looked down to see her prince, sleeping peacefully in the warmth of her breasts. Gently, she brought her hand towards him and lightly nudged his head. Blake slowly opened his eyes as he took in his unfamiliar surroundings. Unable to see much, he started feeling all around him, trying to figure out where he was. Joana softly spoke to him.

“Blake, are you ok?”
“Ye...yeah. Ugh, where am I.”
“Here let me help you.” She lowered her hand down to Blake and cupped it under him, much to his shock. As she brought him out, he was able to see everything around him. His mind started racing, trying to comprehend what was happening.
“What? Where? What the heck?!?”
“Whoa Blake, calm down. Try to remember what happened.” Closing his eyes, he though back trough the day. How did I get myself into this? he thought to himself. He looked back up to Joana, who was obviously concerned again.
“W...wow. That was some sleep. I can’t believe we actually did that.”
“I still can’t believe your actually this small. How is your body?”
“Better. I’m still a bit sore, but definitely not as bad as I was. Thanks again for...you know.”
“Yeah. Anyway, I have some work to do before we head to school. We might as well do it now.”
“Oh, yay...”
